AbstractDBaseParser¶

class Lamia.api.dbasemanager.dbaseparserabstract.AbstractDBaseParser(parserfactory=None, messageinstance=None)[source]¶
dbasetables¶

the dictionnary of dbase (cf DBconfigReader)

worktype¶

Base2_digue, Base2_assainissement ….

Type

dbase type

variante¶

dbase variante

crsnumber¶

crs of dbase int

dbaseressourcesdirectory¶

ressources dir

parserfactory¶

the parser class (used to create another dbaseparser if needed)

dbconfigreader¶

the config reader instance

dbaseofflinemanager¶

the offline manager instance

printsql¶

for debug purpose

visualmode¶

visual mode used in ui

locale¶

language setting

createDBase(crs=None, worktype=None, dbaseressourcesdirectory=None, variante=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
kwargs for postgis :

host=”localhost”, port=None, dbname=None, schema=None, user=None, password=None

kwargs for spatialite :

slfile = slfile

loadDBase(**kwargs)[source]¶
kwargs for postgis :

host, port, dbname, schema, user, password

kwargs for spatialite :

slfile

getLastPK(tablename)[source]¶

Renvoi la version max de la table Revision :return: la version max de la table Revision

getConstraintRawValueFromText(table, field, txt)[source]¶

Convertie la valeur textuelle txt de la table lamia « table » vers sa valeur trigramme :param table: la table lamia considérée :param field: la colonne considérée :param txt: la valeur textuelle :return: le trigramme

getConstraintTextFromRawValue(tablename, field, rawvalue)[source]¶

Convertie le trigramme rawvalue de la table lamia « table » vers sa valeur textuelle :param table: la table lamia considérée :param field: la colonne considérée :param rawvalue: le trigramme ou valeur stockée considérée :return: la valeur textuelle

saveRessourceFile(dbname, featurepk=None, previousfeaturepk=None)[source]¶

Called by saveFeature If ressource file is not in the dbase directory, save it in the dbase directory

completePathOfFile(filetoprocess)[source]¶

Génère le path complet du filetoprocess demandé. Utile quand on a un chemin relatif :param filetoprocess: le chemin rentré (relatif ou absolu) :return: le chemin absolu

getParentTable(tablename)[source]¶

Get Parents table name :param tablename: :return:

Paramètres

  • fromfile –

  • torep –
